extends Object

    • Field Detail

      • next

        public CParserState.Context next
        The next context.

      • flags

        public int flags
        The flags for this context. The flags from LSB to MSB are: FLAG_TYPEDEF, FLAG_SCOPE, FLAG_TYPE_SPEC, FLAG_PARAMS, FLAG_MODIFIED, FLAG_STRUCTURE.

      • bindings

        public final HashMap<String,Boolean> bindings
        The bindings for this context, if any.

      • mark

        public Annotation mark
        The marked annotation, if any.
